hideAxisLabel.title: Is the axis label necessary?
hideAxisLabel.body: If the axis label is self-explanatory, we better leave it out. Select «hide axis label».

shouldBeBarChart.title: Chart type not ideal
shouldBeBarChart.body: Maybe it's better to switch to chart type «Bar». This is often clearer with just one data column.

shouldBeLineChart.title: Chart type not ideal
shouldBeLineChart.body: For so many data points, a line chart is probably more appropriate.

shouldBeBars.title: Many columns
shouldBeBars.body: If labels are overlapping, you should select the option «Bars for mobile» or «Bars instead of columns».

unsupportedDateFormat.title: Unsupported date format
unsupportedDateFormat.body: Column A probably contains an unsupported date format. Please check the handbook for a list of supported formats.

unsupportedDateFormatEvents.title: Unsupported date format
unsupportedDateFormatEvents.body: This date format is not supported. Please check the handbook for a list of supported formats.

Der Titel bringt die Kernaussage der Gra: The title brings the core message of the graphic to the point.
Der Untertitel benennt präzise, was in d: The subtitle names precisely what can be seen in the graphic, including units.
